summary: Adds a Flaming wolf Follower in winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a flaming thrall permanent follower to the frozen hearth in winterhold. it will not explode upon attacking and is compatible with UFO.

Please note if it is your first time talking to blaze he won\'t talk to you however you will get a message saying \"Blaze in now following\". If not sorry don\'t know how to fix this if anyone does know please tell me and i will fix it asap.

Please Report any Incompatibility and bugs. 

The Scripting Is from darkfox127.

The font in the image is the morpheus font which can be downloaded here
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/95
author: Spardaoverlord
